about_the_game:
"Give me back my youthhhhhhh!!"

The moment came without warning. I heard the sound of the world crumbling. Voices I hadn’t heard or recognized came flooding in.

This marks the beginning of a new "game." Will you be able to master this impossible challenge?

'Mukuchi no Kuchinashi ~ Road to Kaiwa Mastery? ~' is a conversation deck-building adventure game where the protagonist, Kuchinashi, who wasted his youth due to "Chuuni" (delusions of grandeur), attempts to reclaim his lost youth through "conversation" at a high school reunion he was invited to for the first time in eight years.

Game Features

Building a Conversation Deck
Use conversation cards, which represent different lines, to liven up your chats with ex-classmates!
As you learn new conversation cards through dialogues, add them to your deck and have even more challenging conversations with others.

Getting Buff Using Drinks
By drinking buff items, you can boost your own energy levels, giving you an edge in conversations, or recover lost mental stamina.

Mastering Conversation Techniques
Successfully engaging in lively conversations with ex-classmates will allow you to learn their conversation techniques.
These unlock special conversation cards or powerful support effects.
